page.title: 11Ecology in Saughall
page.content: We studied trees near our school. Hawthorn is common in hedges,so are privet,blackthorn,and holly.We also found willow, sycamore, hornbeam, elder, damson, silverbirch, flowering cherry, horse chestnut cypress, lilac in hedges or at the roadside.Elms have suffered from Dutch Elm Disease,but new shoots are growing. In Saughall, most people have either fruit, evergreen or ornamental trees planted in their gardens. These are the most common plants by the hedgerow in June: cow parsley, pineapple weed, daisies, nettles, goosegrass and buttercups. In June,the most common bird in Saughall is the starling. These birds are also common: sparrow ,wood pigeon, jackdaw, rook, blackbird, housemartin, thrush, goldfinch, robin, gull, swallow and pied wagtail.
